Description: The Development Manager will be responsible for managing project developments (potentially multiple projects, depending on the scale of projects) within the company from start to finish including commercial management, and project management, as well as managing necessary stakeholders to ensure projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the approved quality. would also be required to participate, on a need basis, in providing relevant inputs during project identification/evaluation and/ or during evaluation of business development opportunities. Skills
Skills: Bachelor’s degree in architecture/ civil engineering/ project management of land development/ a land-related professional discipline
• Minimum 9 – 12 years of relevant experience in project management and construction management, in real estate development
